name: Super Pigeon Pooper
description:
Super Pigeon Pooper is on a mission.

Tap on your device to help him avoid obstacles and feed himself. Then watch your Pigeon get fatter and heavier. When your Pigeon is too fat and too heavy, simply Tap the blue square to lighten the load!.. And get back to swooping.

Tap and swoop your way to earning your prestigious Black Belt in Super Pigeon Pooper… and then try and rank even higher.

7 different belt rankings to swoop your way through
- White Belt (10pts)
- Blue Belt (20 pts)
- Purple Belt (30 pts)
- Brown Belt (40 pts)
- Black Belt (50 pts)
- Black and Red Belt (75 pts)
- Red Belt (over 100 pts)

SFX
8 BIT SOUND EFFECTS and exclusive chip music.

Enjoy!
